channel.title: ContainerImages on Techy Tonik
channel.description: Recent content in ContainerImages on Techy Tonik

item.title: CloudBuild: Speeding container builds by caching
item.description: Introduction When building containers we can always leverage the layer caching mechanism to speed up the container builds. This can become tricky depending on the CI/CD tool used for building the images. For offering like Jenkins we may not need to worry much as we can expect a copy of previously build container image to be present. On the other hand, if we see Cloud Build it won’t have a copy of previous build, as the offering is serverless so starts light and stateless.
